name: Culture Dagger Mobile
description:
You have awakened on the day of  your quest to find the lost audio  archives needed to restore your  ancestors culture. Many months have  been spent planning this adventure. 
You  are a direct descendant of the SKGA Director Suzuki Raoh. An  alien race  known as the Hatyrons used evil technology to wipe all  physical memory  and data of the audio format known as Boom Bap 
The  alien memory wipe also lowered the citizens comprehension of  Boom Bap  audio to be puzzling and confusing. Legend is that all  remaining Boom  Bap records are held by the Hatyrons.
 Its Up to you and your team of loyal allies to restore Boom Bap to its rightful place in existence.
